I'm mia!

We come here in order to lift up the anti-psychiatric and mad voices on Fediverse and to combat ableism that's common in this community.

We reject to conform to the notions that mad folk need to be locked up or medicalized against their will. We reject the words of the hypocritical psychiatric bodies that want to dictate who is normal and who is not.

We are rad and will not kowtow to the niceness and formality. Listen to us first.

𖡄 • Kalla • she/her • 26 • 🗺🇪🇺🇭🇺 • ⚧

𝒄𝒓𝒂𝒛𝒚 𝒂𝒔𝒔 𝒔𝒊𝒏𝒄𝒆 𝒊 𝒘𝒂𝒔 𝒕𝒉𝒓𝒆𝒆

i'm a little bit of everything, depending on the time... i've studied architecture and mathematics but my interests reach far and wide beyond. i'd say i'm a jack of all trades, a polymath in training. i love all things open-source. i believe in dignity for everyone. i am an advocate for accessibility. drug positive, but i'm going natural for a while now. i used to be hypersexual, now i'm kinda celibate. i enjoy engaging with philosophy. i am full of love and also full of anger. currently recovering from a series of horrific events in my life. working as a software tester in hungary rn, my goal is to get some experience & leave this country preferably in the next 2 years. (are these things weird to put in a bio? probably, but i hadn't talked to anyone in ages so i am a little weird rn. + i can always rewrite it + i come here to be weird) sorry if i don't answer to a reply or a mention - sometimes i run out of words ∧/∨ forget to reply.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

i've been on tumblr for 11+ years, now i'm trying to settle in the fediverse. this is my main account where i girlblog and shitpost and share my litte thoughts. my other fedi account is @fizzymuse@mastodon.world - i plan to culture/museumpost there, check it out if you want to!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

you can also find me on soulseek as fizzyday, check out my taste in music if you like:)
